org.apache.velocity.anakia
Class AnakiaJDOMFactory

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--org.apache.velocity.anakia.AnakiaJDOMFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jdom.input.JDOMFactory
public class AnakiaJDOMFactory
extends org.jdom.input.DefaultJDOMFactory

A customized JDOMFactory for Anakia that produces AnakiaElement instances instead of ordinary JDOM Element instances.

Version:
$Id: AnakiaJDOMFactory.java,v 1.2.8.1 2004/03/03 23:22:04 geirm Exp $
Author:
